title: Chris Williamson – 2020 Comments on Rebecca Long-Bailey
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the comments made by Chris Williamson, the former Labour MP for Derby North, on Twitter on 25 June 2020.
content:
So RBL [Rebecca Long-Bailey] is sacked by Sir Starmer for sharing Maxine Peake’s interview with the Independent!
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

  *[6G]: sixth generation mobile network
  *[ITU]: International Telecommunication Union
  *[R&D]: research and development
  *[OpenRAN]: Open Radio Access Networks
  *[ONE]: Open Network Ecosystem

The abject failure of ANY MP to join me in condemning the witch-hunt years ago has led directly to this. And it’s only going to get worse.
